subtitle: Great for kids, this almost instant dessert is extremely versatile and could be served with either mixed seasonal fruits or a little ice cream.

method.text: Whisk the egg yolks, water and caster sugar together until pale and creamy. In a separate non-greasy bowl, whisk the egg whites until just stiff.
Carefully fold the beaten egg white into the egg yolk mixture. Fold in the cocoa powder.
Heat a 15 - 18 cm omelette pan over a very gentle heat.  Spread the egg mixture into the pan. Cook gently, without moving, until the bottom is set and pale golden brown.
Place the omelette under a preheated grill until pale golden brown. Add a filling of your choice and serve, dredged with icing sugar.

title: Chocolate souffle omelette
